committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the second full calendar week in March of each year as "National Employ the Older Worker Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the second full calendar week in March of each year as "National Employ the Older Worker Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the second full calendar week in March of each year as "National Employ the Older Worker Week".
